## Initialise the environment
```{r init,message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r load_data}
steps <- read.csv("activity.csv")
steps <- steps %>% mutate(date=ymd(date))
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r mean_steps_per_day}
steps_per_day  <- steps %>% group_by(date) %>% summarise(sum=sum(steps,na.rm=TRUE))

ggplot(steps_per_day,aes(sum))+geom_histogram()

mean(steps_per_day$sum,na.rm=TRUE)
median(steps_per_day$sum,na.rm=TRUE)
```
